body: The logs indicate the same logic is executed. I do not know why it would display in one case but not the other then.
Could you try a recent Snapshot? A potential issue was recently fixed.

Tried with 1.2.4-178-g2c892fe.
Still the same result as reported.

Attached the overlay debug logs from the snapshot.
